briefDescription: The type of buffer that [[gpu_vkBuffer_allocator]] is.
detailedDescription: The type of buffer that [[gpu_vkBuffer_allocator]] is.
warnings: This reveals a lower level of abstractions, and so this should rarely be used directly.

values.name: index
values.briefDescription: An index buffer, as in one whose data specifies which, of the given inputs, an [[input_shader]] should use and in what order.
values.detailedDescription: An index buffer, as in one whose data specifies which, of the given inputs, an [[input_shader]] should use and in what order.

values.name: input
values.briefDescription: A vertex buffer, as in one that contains the inputs to an [[input_shader]].
values.detailedDescription: A vertex buffer, as in one that contains the inputs to an [[input_shader]].

values.name: uniform
values.briefDescription: An uniform buffer, as in one that contains a field of a [[shader]].
values.detailedDescription: An uniform buffer, as in one that contains a field of a [[shader]].
